metadata.synopsis: Two teenagers discuss sneaking past the South Span Checkpoint. This is the dragonborn's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6.5;50;-18.5- Talk to the dragonborn of the Horny Stupid Teenagers vignette

0.speaker: Gaheid Slickjaw
0.text: I'm not scared of the authorities... but it'd be stupid to pick a fight with the Fist, right?
